title.rendered: BEST NUDE SHOES FOR ALL SKIN TONES

content.rendered:
BEST NUDE SHOES FOR ALL SKIN TONES

Kahmune is a luxury footwear for all skin tones with over 10 shades of nude pumps that perfectly match you. D’Lashes is honored and excited to become the embassador of such an amazing forward-thinking company. To shop Kahmune shoes just click on any picture or click here. Also, don’t forget to check out their video below for more information and give them a follow on Instagram @kahmune

KAHMUNE

“Whilst browsing social media in search of “nude” clothes and accessories, I noticed that the term always drew the same results. Although I was in search of items that matched my dark skin tone, all I kept coming across were the same beige and tan shades. It was overtly clear that “nude” had a type, and my complexion didn’t fit the bill. Adamant about having a true nude shoe for my skin tone, I settled for purchasing a pair of white heels and painting them. Though I loved the result, It didn’t feel right that I would have to go to such lengths. Realizing that if I was having an issue with the lack of availability, there had to be many other women out there feeling the same way. KAHMUNE was born as a long overdue solution to the age-old idea that “nude” is one color.”

We now have 10 skin tone hues in order to provide all women with a true nude option. Each shade is named after a city or region in the world that inspired it.” Jamela A Acheampong www.kahmune.com

LOVE DIONNE
